title: "Freedom through flight: a bird's natural right"
description: Iris Kilmister will speak about the illegal bird trade and the issues that emerge when birds are taken from their homes in the wild, in order to be kept for human entertainment. As a past bird owner she has realized her mistakes and done  research into where these birds really come from, and what can be done to preserve their invaluable place in our ecosystem.
author: Iris Kilmister
